  1. City Council

City Council

  1. Robert Crawley

    Mayor

  1. Michael Courtright

  1. James Thorne

  1. Josh Massey

  1. Spence Redwine

  1. Aaron Thomas

  1. Teresa Adams

    Council Place 6/Mayor Pro Tem

The City Council consists of 7 members elected by the residents of the City of Denison. Four of the council members are elected from single member districts, places 1 through 4, and 3 are elected at large, including the mayor and places 5 and 6.

  • Appoints the city manager, who executes the laws and administers the government of the city
